org.plexian.grumy.tile

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plexian.grumy.tile.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedTile, BackgroundTile, TileAir, TileAnti, TileChainLeft, TileChainRight, TileDoor, TileItemKey, TileItemSlot, TileKeyPickup, TileMaterialKey, TilePlayerLeft, TilePlayerRight, TileSand, TileSandstone, TileSantaPresent, TileStars, TileStarsPlanet, TileSteel

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for tiles. Holds a static map of all tiles and their ids.
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Walt

      • getTile

        public static Tile getTile(int id)
        Get an instance of Tile with id id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the tile.
        Returns:
        An instance of tile with id id, or an instance of TileAir.

      • draw

        public static void draw(double x,
                        double y,
                        int id,
                        float size)
        Draw a tile at (x, y) with size size.
        Parameters:
        x - The X-coordinate to draw tile at (in world coordinates).
        y - The Y-coordinate to draw tile at (in world coordinates).
        size - The size (in tile sizes) to draw the tile as.
